kubejs.ponder.enchanting_table.text_1: Enchanting tables can enchant books, armor, weapons, and much more.
kubejs.ponder.enchanting_table.text_2: Adding enchanting tables within a 2 block radius of the table can increase the level of enchantments you could get
kubejs.ponder.enchanting_table.text_3: Adding more layers can increase the level of enchantments you can go
kubejs.ponder.enchanting_table.text_4: It's important to note that only 15 book shelves are needed to achieve the maximum enchantment level of 30
kubejs.ponder.end_portal_frame.header: How to build a end portal
kubejs.ponder.nether_portal.header: How to build a nether portal
